content: wheat cable finished measurements 16 circumference x 10 tall unstretched hat will stretch to fit a 20-21 in head easily yarn worsted weight approximately 185 yds skills long tail cast on knit purl cabling needles and notions us 7 4 5 mm 16 circular needle and a set of double point 1 cable needle 4 markers 1 darning needle gauge 18 stsand 22 rnds= 4 in 1x1 rib unblocked notes hat is worked in the round abbreviations instructions bor beginning of round pattern in written and charted for 4 section repeat four times you may want to pm between each section 24 cn cable needle stitch per repeat co cast on k knit brim using circular needle and your favorite stretchy long tail m marker cast on 96 sts place market at the beginning of the first p purl row and be careful not to twist the cast on round pm place marker k1 p1 until the piece measures 4 or to desired length k2tog knit two together k3tog knit three together p2tog purl two together ssk slip slip knit 1/1 lc slip next stitch to cnand hold to front k1 then k1 from cn 2/1 lc slip next 2 stitches to cnand hold to front k1 then k2 from cn 2/1 rc slip next 2 stitches to cnand hold to back k1 then k2 from cn 3/3 lc slip next 3 stitches to cnand hold to front k3 then k3 from cn 3/3 rc slip next 3 stitches to cnand hold to back k3 then k3 from cn instructions pattern row round 1 *ktbl p1 k2 p2 k1 p1 ×6 k1 p2 k3* repeat to end 3 more times round 2 *ktbl p1 1/1 lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1* repeat to end 3 more times round 3 * ktbl p1 k2 p2 3/3 rc k1 3/3 lc p2 k2 p1 * repeat to end round 4 * ktbl p1 1/1 lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1 * repeat to end round 5 * ktbl p1 k2 p2 k13 p2 k2 p1 * repeat to end round 6 * ktbl p1 1/1 lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1 * repeat to end rounds 7 * ktbl p1 k2 p2 3/3rc k1 3/3 lc p2 k2 p1 * repeat to end round 8 * ktbl p1 1/1 lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1 * repeat to end round 9 * ktbl p1 k2 p2 k13 p2 k2 p1 * repeat to end round 10 * ktbl p1 1/1lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1 * repeat to end round 11 * ktbl p1 k2 p2 3/3 rc k1 3/3lc p2 k2 p1 * repeat to end round 12 * ktbl p1 1/1lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1 * repeat to end round 13 * ktbl p1 k2 p2 k13 p2 k2 p1 * repeat to end round 14 * ktbl p1 1/1lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1 * repeat to end rounds 3 --
